product_name: AlpineAire Foods Creamy Potato Cheddar Soup - 2 Servings
long_description: Warm your core and treat your taste buds with hearty and nutritious potatoes, cheddar cheese, red bell peppers and green onions in the AlpineAire Foods Creamy Potato Cheddar Soup.
